Description: The CMU Travel Insurance Homepage (Regular SI) must enable customers to explore options, get quotes, and purchase. Include CTAs and accessibility.
Trip Selection page must let customers select plan, show indicators and back button.
Trip Dates page must capture dates, validate input, include back button and links.
Trip Booking must confirm details, show steps/status, include Subscribe/Save/View actions.
Plan Selection shows plan options (Essential/Smart/Comfort), filters, Modify inputs, pricing/discount.
Optional Coverages allow add/remove coverages with indicators and validation.
Payment Processing must support multiple payment methods, validate cards, and handle secure transactions.
Confirmation Page must display booking summary, policy details, and download options.
Email Notifications must send booking confirmations and policy documents to customers.
Claims Submission portal must allow customers to upload documents and track claim status.
Document Upload must support multiple file formats with size validation and virus scanning.
Claim Status Tracking must provide real-time updates and estimated processing times.
Live Chat integration must connect customers with support agents during business hours.
FAQ System must provide searchable knowledge base with categorized help articles.
Ticket Management must allow customers to create and track support requests.
Policy Renewal must send reminders and enable online renewal with updated terms.
Policy Modification must allow customers to update coverage and personal information.
Cancellation Process must handle refunds and provide cancellation confirmation.
Dashboard Analytics must display booking trends, conversion rates, and customer insights.
Revenue Reports must generate monthly/quarterly financial summaries for management.
Customer Behavior Analytics must track user journeys and identify optimization opportunities.
